attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To move more to the Left and bring back “Old Labour” – We have tried “New Labour” and it has failed! "New Labour" has never helped true Labour supporters and the Middle Class.  Labour needs to change back to true socialism before it is too late!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
